title: Blue Bloods Star Vanessa Ray Welcomes Baby Boy with Husband Landon Beard: 'Quite a Whirlwind' (Exclusive) | Flipboard
text: Blue Bloods Star Vanessa Ray Welcomes Baby Boy with Husband Landon Beard: 'Quite a Whirlwind' (Exclusive) Vanessa Ray's family has grown by one more! The actress, who is currently starring in her tenth season of Blue Bloods, welcomed a baby boy via adoption with husband Landon Beard, she exclusively tells PEOPLE.
